prompt: Image Prompt: "Create an ethereal and symbolic representation of the Ontological Trinity, showcasing three interconnected and radiant figures embodying the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit. The figures should exude divine presence and unity, surrounded by a soft golden light symbolizing their eternal bond and essence. Incorporate subtle visual cues such as a triangle to signify the interconnectedness of the three persons within the Godhead. The overall atmosphere should evoke a sense of spiritual profundity and mystery, resonating with the theological concept of the Trinity in Christian belief."
